title: When our family moved to Florida with the ACL RR in 1960 our home was in the 700 block of Country Club Rd. I noticed that block is now the 1100 block of C.C. Rd. When and why did the renumbering of C.C. Rd. occur? Also, were other Wilmington area streets renumbered at the same time C.C. Rd. was renumbered?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Sorry for the delay. And
